comments.text:
On many linux test since around Christmas, the test will fail because of little white rectangles at the top or bottom of an image.  This affects many (seemingly random) tests.  It has only been reported with a variety of ATI cards.

Examples:
http://sm-brasstacks01.mozilla.org:8100/resultserv/data/testcase/7033239/
http://sm-brasstacks01.mozilla.org:8100/resultserv/data/testcase/6793813/
http://sm-brasstacks01.mozilla.org:8100/resultserv/data/testcase/6794194/
http://sm-brasstacks01.mozilla.org:8100/resultserv/data/testcase/6947277/
comments.creator: jgriffin@mozilla.com
